name: Before the Storm (Prototype)
description:
Controls:

PlayerMoveRedYellowBlueCook!P1Arrow KeysASDF

Objective: Lure each animal onto the ark with food that you think they'd like!

Before the Storm is a prototype about making things. The systems are a little bit obtuse, which leaves learning how to navigate them the center of emergent interactions. Every creature is different, every color means something slightly different, and the animals don't always respond.

Class: Pixel Prototype

Assignment: Food

Postmortem: Very happy with how this came out. I think the game feels strange and nuanced, which is what I was hoping for. The biggest problem is that the animals don't always do the things they're supposed to. I have literally no idea why, but I guess it makes them feel more like living creatures, which I'm into.
